de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.sprites

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.sprites.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SoundSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Firebeam, Player, Punch, Testball

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements SoundSource
    Abstract class for Sprites.
    Author:
    Zabuza

      • render

        public abstract void render(java.awt.Graphics g,
          float alpha)
        Renders the Sprite on a Graphics object.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object to draw on
        alpha - 1 if all ticks for the second are done, 0 if none is done, 0.5 if half etc.

      • updateCoords

        public final void updateCoords()
        Updates the current coordinates x and y by adding xa and ya. The PhysicEngine will modify the coordinates here.
